Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with Meropenem (Mer) (0.004-32 μg/mL)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of gram-negative bacilli
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panel with Meropenem to determine antimicrobial susceptibility, with additional indications for Acinetobacter spp.
Indications for Use Summary: For determination of antimicrobial agent susceptibility of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli, including Acinetobacter spp., using meropenem.
